title: Sampler, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, half cross, tent, stem, and star stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Sixteen rectangles of pattern at the top. Field filled with bands of floral pattern, floral motifs at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, half cross, tent, stem, and star stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-181.
